highlights: Focus on SEO to search ranking
description1: GTS Services in the Portland area hired me as their in-house designer/developer to completely revive their online presence. My first initiative was to rebrand the company geared towards expanding into markets the company was aiming to become a part of in the near future. They also had multiple websites that needed to be revived with updated design.
description2: Included below are images from the main website build. A site map and wireframes were created initially to set the scope and rough in the content blocks that were to comprise the various pages. I also created an online style guide that could be referenced by other colleagues whenever necessary.
